title: Question 22
description: How many $BOND tokens are allocated to the Liquidity Pool Incentivization program?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
This initiative is granted with 20% (2,000,000 $BOND tokens) and each epoch will have 20,000 $BOND tokens to start. 

The Liquidity Pool Incentivization will run for 100 weeks and each epoch will last 1 week. At the end of the epoch the users can claim their $BOND.
